Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when both derivation data and key
        material are provided for hash-based key derivation.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = enums.DerivationMethod.HASH, 16
kwargs = {'hash_algorithm': enums.HashingAlgorithm.SHA_256,
    'derivation_data': b'\x01\x02\x03\x04', 'key_material': b'\n\x0b\x0c\r'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'For hash-based key derivation, specify only derivation data or key material, not both.'
    , engine.derive_key, *args, **kwargs)
